[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
actions=negotiate

[client10026]
port=10026

[client10027]
port=10027

[negotiate]
command=negotiate

version=2
action=add-headers|change-body|quarantine
step=no-connect|no-helo|no-envelope-from|no-envelope-recipient|no-body|no-headers|no-end-of-header

response=negotiate
n_received=2
status=continue

options=2;add-headers|change-body|quarantine;no-connect|no-helo|no-envelope-from|no-envelope-recipient|no-body|no-headers|no-end-of-header;2;add-headers|change-body|quarantine;no-connect|no-helo|no-envelope-from|no-envelope-recipient|no-body|no-headers|no-end-of-header;
